    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1

    Facet RoomType_Detail

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:RoomType_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:RoomType_Summary
          • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:RoomType_Detail

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<RoomTypeDetail xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" objID="roomType_1" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1">
    <RoomCharacteristicsDetail architectureCode="2" compositeInd="true" floor="1234" gender="Male" invBlockCode="Example String Value" nonSmokingInd="true" sharedRoomInd="true" sizeMeasurement="Example String Value" typeCode="Example String Value">
        <LocationCode>Annex room</LocationCode>
        <AccessibilityFeature description="Door locks at wheelchair height." quantity="2">
            <DisabilityFeature_Enum>Accessibility to goods and services</DisabilityFeature_Enum>
        </AccessibilityFeature>
        <SecurityFeature description="Smoke alarm in room." quantity="1">
            <SecurityFeature>2nd lock on guest doors</SecurityFeature>
        </SecurityFeature>
        <BedTypeCode>Dorm bed</BedTypeCode>
        <Category>Budget</Category>
        <ClassificationCode>1 room cabin</ClassificationCode>
        <ViewCode>Annex room</ViewCode>
    </RoomCharacteristicsDetail>
    <ota2-0400:Description name="paragraph name" number="2345">
        <ota2-0400:Text language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</ota2-0400:Text>
        <ota2-0400:Image colorSpace="Example String Value" dimensionCategory="Example String Value" format="2" objID="image_1" originalIndicatorInd="true" resolution="4567" sort="3456" version="Example String Value">
            <ota2-0400:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</ota2-0400:Identifier>
            <ota2-0400:ImageRef>image_1</ota2-0400:ImageRef>
            <ota2-0400:URL>http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00</ota2-0400:URL>
            <ota2-0400:Details applicableEnd="2011-07-04" applicableStart="2011-01-24" author="Example String Value" copyrightEnd="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" copyrightNotice="Example String Value" copyrightOwner="Example String Value" copyrightStart="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveEnd="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveStart="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z">Example String Value</ota2-0400:Details>
            <ota2-0400:MultimediaDescription caption="The Empire State Building at sunset." language="en" title="Example String Value">
                <ota2-0400:FormattedTextSubSection subCode="Example String Value" subSectionNumber="1234" subTitle="Example String Value"/>
            </ota2-0400:MultimediaDescription>
            <ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp create="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" purge="2011-12-05">2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00</ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp>
            <ota2-0400:Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true">
                <ota2-0400:Address>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Address>
                <ota2-0400:Type>Business</ota2-0400:Type>
                <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
            </ota2-0400:Email>
            <ota2-0400:Dimensions height="3456" unitOfMeasureCode="2" width="2345"/>
            <ota2-0400:File name="Example String Value" originalName="Example String Value" size="4567"/>
            <ota2-0400:Geolocation altitude="Example String Value" altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum="Miles" formatURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" latitude="Example String Value" longitude="Example String Value" mapURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/>
        </ota2-0400:Image>
        <ota2-0400:URL>http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema</ota2-0400:URL>
        <ota2-0400:ParagraphListItem language="en" listItem="1234" text2="Formatted text example." textFormat="HTML"/>
        <ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp create="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" purge="2011-01-24">2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00</ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp>
    </ota2-0400:Description>
    <ota2-0400:Amenity description="Example String Value" name="Example String Value">
        <ota2-0400:Code codeContext="Example String Value" description="Example String Value">Example String Value</ota2-0400:Code>
    </ota2-0400:Amenity>
    <RoomOccupancy maxOccupancy="4" minOccupancy="1">
        <AgeQualifying>Junior</AgeQualifying>
    </RoomOccupancy>
    <Code codeContext="Example String Value" description="Example String Value">Example String Value</Code>
    <Tier>2</Tier>
</RoomTypeDetail>

      {
  "RoomTypeDetail" : {
    "objID" : "roomType_1",

      "@type" : "RoomCharacteristicsDetail",

      } ],

          "value" : "2nd lock on guest doors"

      } ],
